creator: Hearing Tools
descriptionHtml:
Bluetooth hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android.

Hearing Aid App for android bluetooth enhances sound from conversations and your environment to improve your hearing. The hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android supports bluetooth connection so you can use bluetooth earphones, earbuds, and headphones to hear the amplified sound.

Hearing Aid App for android bluetooth is an everyday hearing amplifier for people with hearing impairment which helps people hear better and communicate effectively with friends and family.

Hearing Aid App for android bluetooth has a high quality sound recorder so you can easily record audio from your surroundings. You can save and load your customized settings and configurations.

During lectures, concerts and recreational activities, you can use hearing aid app for android to hear louder especially when you’re far from the source of sound.

Note: Using bluetooth headset may cause slight delay in audio transmission.

Features:
1. Hear conversations using the hearing amplifier.
2. Record sound using the sound recorder.
3. Noise suppression filters noise from sound output.
4. Echo cancellation eliminates background echo for sound clarity.
5. See waveform of streamed sound using the visualizer.
6. You can save your customized configurations.
7. The hearing aid app for android runs in background.
descriptionShort: Hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android bluetooth.
title: Hearing Aid App for Android

creator: Hearing Tools
descriptionHtml:
Earcare Hearing Aid App is your personal hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android that amplifies and boosts sound from your surroundings to wire and bluetooth listening devices for better hearing.

Hear conversations, lectures, the crashing of the waves and any sound from your surroundings. “What did you say?” and “Can you repeat that?” are all phrases of the past and you can now hear what’s going on around you and eliminate danger.

You can now hear everything clearly
- Earcare Hearing Aid App supports your hearing. You can benefit from a hearing amplifier that can process and improve external audio for your ears.

Earcare provides better speech understanding and intelligibility
- Earcare Hearing Aid App uses audio features to suppress noise and increase speech intelligibility to improve your hearing.
- Audio signals are amplified through the hearing amplifier while noise is suppressed and streamed to your Bluetooth or wired listening device.

Supports Wireless & Wired Earphones
- Supports almost all headphones and listening devices that can be connected through Bluetooth or a cable. Use earphones, headphones, and earbuds to hear the amplified sound for better hearing.

Adjusts sound quality for your ears
- Choose Equalizer presets and use loudness enhancement, bass boost, echo cancellation, and noise suppression to adjust sound quality and instantly notice the difference. You can also control the volume of sound. Note that every person and every situation is different.

Record sound around you
- Use the sound recorder to record and save audio from your surroundings.

Earcare hearing aid app for android bluetooth is your personal hearing aid app, audio booster, sound amplifier, hearing amplifier, and super hearing app for wired and bluetooth listening devices.

Use earcare hearing aid app to enhance sound from conversations and your environment to improve your hearing. The hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android supports bluetooth connection so you can use bluetooth earphones, earbuds, and headphones.

During lectures, concerts and recreational activities, you can use this hearing amplifier and hearing aid app for android to hear louder especially when you’re far from the source of sound.

4. Echo cancellation eliminates background echo for sound clarity.
5. See waveform of streamed sound using the audio visualizer.
6. You can save and load your customized configurations.
7. The hearing aid app for android also runs in background.

descriptionShort: Hearing aid app for android bluetooth and hearing amplifier.
title: Hearing Aid App for Android

creator: Hearing Amplifier
descriptionHtml:
Earcare is a hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth that uses phone microphone, headset mic or Bluetooth mic to boost the sounds around you to help you hear conversations and surrounding sounds louder and clearer. Earcare hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth enhances sound from your environment and streams to your wired and Bluetooth listening devices for better hearing. The hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth is useful for people who have difficulty hearing conversation when other people are talking or there is significant background noise. Earcare hearing aid helps you hear voices and human speech louder and clearer.

Earcare hearing aid app enhances external sound for your ears. The hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth can be used by hearing-impaired people who have difficulty hearing conversations when other people are talking. The hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth makes voices louder and allows you to reduce unwanted background noise to make sound clear for your ears. Human speech and voice signals are amplified while noise is suppressed.

WHY EARCARE?
1. Use your phone or headset as a hearing aid to solve your hearing problems (such as hearing loss) if you cannot afford expensive prescription hearing aids, or as temporary hearing aid when you’ve lost your medical hearing aid device.
2. Hear conversations better by boosting important sounds and reducing unwanted background noise.
3. Hear your surroundings from afar, or know what’s happening around you to detect danger and protect your properties or kids.
4. Hear TV louder while the volume remains the same for others. No need to ask people to turn up or increase the TV volume. Simply connect Bluetooth headphones, move up the boost slider, and place your phone near the TV to hear louder.
5. Listen and record lectures (at the same time) from back of the class.
6. Record sounds from your surroundings.
7. Stop asking people to repeat what they said to avoid frustration and embarrassment. “What did you say?” and “Can you repeat that?” are phrases of the past. With Earcare hearing aid you can hear comfortably.

Listen with any wired or wireless listening device, including earphones, Bluetooth headset, wired headphones and earbuds. You can use the microphone on the phone or your headset (wired or Bluetooth).
• Device Microphone (The mic on your Android smartphone or tablet)
• Headset Microphone (The mic on your earphones or wired headphones)
• Bluetooth Microphone (The mic on your Bluetooth headset or earbuds)

A “hearing aid” is a medical device worn in the ear by people with hearing difficulties to enable them to hear well. A partially deaf person wears a hearing aid as a listening device to amplify sounds for better hearing. Even people who have profound hearing loss will benefit from hearing aids, because hearing aid manufacturers offer versions of the hearing aid to assist patients who cannot hear sounds at a specific frequency.

"Hearing impaired" describes people with any degree of hearing loss, from mild to profound, including those who are deaf and those who are hard of hearing. Hearing impairment, deafness, or hearing loss refers to the total or partial inability to hear sounds. Hearing loss is a partial or total inability to hear. Hearing loss affects people of all ages and can be caused by many different factors.

Earcare hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth uses Android’s powerful audio features to boost your hearing: microphone (detects and captures the sound), sound amplifier or booster (makes the sound louder and stronger depending on the current boost level), and listening device (the earphones, headphones or Bluetooth headset speaker that sends the sound into your ear so that you can hear it).
descriptionShort: Hearing aid app for Android Bluetooth.

title:
Hearing Aid App for Android
1.0.5

creator: Hearing Amplifier
descriptionHtml:
ListenClear hearing aid enhances everyday conversations and surrounding sounds, making them louder and clearer for individuals who are hard of hearing or suffer from hearing loss. Paired with a set of headphones or earphones, Listen Clear from Distance helps address hearing problems and improve clarity during various situations, including conversations and meetings. Use ListenClear hearing aid with wired or Bluetooth headphones to filter, augment, and amplify the sounds in your environment, providing clearer and louder hearing from a distance.

Listen Clear from Distance can turn your phone into a makeshift audio-only baby monitor for when the baby's napping, and you're working or relaxing in another room. Simply place the phone near the baby's crib and use your earbuds or Bluetooth headphones to listen in from afar. It has gained popularity among parents since it can effectively separate voice from background noise. Listen Clear from Distance continues working even when other audio is being played on your phone, allowing you to listen to music or a podcast while still keeping tabs on the baby.

You can place your phone in front of your TV and listen to your TV show or series from outside another room while you're relaxing or busy. With Bluetooth headphones, ListenClear hearing aid becomes reliable for clear hearing from a distance when the audio source is far away, allowing you to perceive your surroundings.

Listen Clear from Distance helps you hear sounds from a distance, boosting your hearing capabilities. Listen Clear hearing aid allows you to amplify important sounds and adjust the volume to the maximum level.

ListenClear hearing aid uses the microphone on your smartphone or tablet to capture nearby sounds and delivers them to your ears at a louder volume, enhancing your overall hearing. By connecting earphones or Bluetooth headphones and tapping the Play button, you can easily listen to the amplified sounds picked up by the microphone in your surroundings.

Listen Clear hearing aid makes it feasible to use your Android device as a hearing aid, restoring natural hearing for individuals who are hard of hearing. It eliminates the need to constantly ask people to repeat themselves and serves as a temporary solution in case you misplace your prescribed medical hearing aid device.

ListenClear hearing aid reduces background noise, ensuring that the sound delivered to your ears is clear and focused. This hearing aid app has become the choice of thousands of hearing-impaired individuals seeking an effective solution to their hearing problems.

For students, ListenClear hearing aid proves to be a valuable tool for listening to lectures from the back of the class and recording lessons. Additionally, the app facilitates remote hearing by connecting Bluetooth earphones, providing an immersive experience without affecting others' volume levels.

During leisure time, ListenClear hearing aid can be employed to stay alert to your surroundings, listen to nature sounds like birdsong, or function as a hearing amplifier for activities such as hunting.

The hearing aid app allows you to choose between using the phone's microphone or the headset microphone for sound amplification, providing flexibility in your hearing experience.

ListenClear hearing aid offers an essential solution for individuals experiencing hearing loss or impairment. Its comprehensive features cater to diverse scenarios, making it an accessible and inclusive technology for enhanced hearing using earbuds or Bluetooth headphones.

ListenClear hearing aid improves hearing during conversations with friends and family by providing a clear listening experience, even if your Android device is placed in a different room. For parents, it serves as a reliable makeshift baby monitor, separating important sounds from background noise. The hearing aid app remains functional amidst other audio playback, allowing you to multitask and stay connected with your surroundings.
descriptionShort: Hearing aids for louder and clearer hearing from any distance.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: After listening to your suggestions, we've added new features, redesigned the UI and fixed reported bugs.

title:
Hearing Aid App for Android
1.0.9

creator: Hearing Amplifier
descriptionHtml:
● Are you hearing impaired, hard of hearing or suffering hearing loss?
● Can’t find your prescription hearing aids?
● Forgot to bring your prescription hearing aids with you to work or school?
● Cannot afford medical prescription hearing aids?
● Do you struggle to hear speech, conversations or external sounds due to mild hearing loss or hearing impairment?
● Cannot hear sound from your TV or laptop loud enough?

Simply plug in wired earphones into your phone and use Earcare hearing aid app for hearing enhancement like real hearing aids.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android is designed for people who are hearing impaired or suffering hearing loss and individuals who need louder hearing or clear hearing.

Plug in wired earphones and use Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android to hear speech, conversations and surrounding sounds clearly without audio delay or latency.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android helps you hear better during meetings at work or conversations with family and friends.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android uses your phone’s built-in microphone to pick up speech or nearby sounds and deliver the sound to your ear at louder volume, while reducing background noise for clear hearing.

You can adjust the loudness of the sound based on your level of hearing loss.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android reduces background noise to make sound clear for your ears and amplifies the sound to make it louder for your ears.

Hearing Aid App for Android is designed for people who are hearing impaired or suffering hearing loss.

Now you can hear speech and external sounds clearly without asking people to repeat what they say.

“What did you say?” and “Can you repeat that?” are a thing of the past and you can now hear comfortably.

Whether you only need louder hearing or you have otosclerosis with tinnitus, you can use this hearing aid app lets you use your phone like a real hearing aid.

Earcare hearing aid is a cheap, affordable solution for individuals who cannot afford prescription hearing aids.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android solves your hearing problems and makes speech, conversations and people’s voices louder and clearer for your ears, especially if you are hard of hearing or hearing impaired.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android makes it possible to use your phone, together with wired earphones or headphones, as a hearing aid to restore your normal hearing.

You can choose whether to use the phone's microphone or the microphone on your headset to capture and amplify sound.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android restores your normal hearing and helps you hear without any limits. With this hearing aid app, you can hear even when someone whispers.

Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android improves your hearing, but it’s not a substitute for hearing aids! You can use this hearing aid app for Android until you get medical prescription hearing aids.

Thousands of hearing-impaired people use Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android to solve their hearing problems.

FEATURES:
● Sound Booster – increase loudness of the sound for louder hearing;
● Noise suppression – eliminates background noise, increases speech clarity;
● Equalizer – fine-tune and enhance for clear sound.
● Sound Recorder – record the sound (while you’re listening) so that you can listen again later.
● Microphone Selection: Choose whether to use the phone’s microphone or your headset’s microphone.
● Adjust each ear separately.
● Bluetooth Connectivity -- Supports Bluetooth headsets and Android-compatible hearing aids.
● Create unlimited settings profiles for different situations;
● Amplification formula for quiet sounds in case of tinnitus;
● Audio recorder / Dictaphone
● Background Listening: Continue listening even if you’re using other apps or the phone's screen is locked or off.

NOTE: Use wired earphones or headphones because Bluetooth has a 1-second audio delay or latency.
descriptionShort: Hearing aid app for Android that solves your hearing impairment or hearing loss.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: No delay when using wired earphones or wired headphones.

title:
Hearing Aid App for Android
1.1.0

creator: Firehawk
descriptionHtml:
Earcare hearing aid app for Android use the phone’s mic or headset mic to carry sounds from the environment into your ear and make them louder and clearer. Earcare turns your earphones or earbuds into a hearing aid.

This hearing aid app uses your Android device's microphone to amplify sound and gives you the ability to adjust sound settings, making it easier to hear.

Earcare hearing aid app for Android can amplify sound to help improve hearing and speech comprehension in people with mild to moderate hearing loss.

Hearing aid app for Android improves hearing. Hearing aid app for Android provides hearing enhancement or hearing assistance for the hearing impaired or hard of hearing. Hearing aid app for Android will assist you to hear better during conversations, meetings or lectures.

Thousands of hearing-impaired people use hearing aid app for Android to solve their hearing problems.

Hearing aid app for Android works with any wired and Bluetooth earphones and headphones.

Hearing aid app for Android uses the microphone on your phone or headset to capture external sound, eliminates background noise to make the sound clear, and amplifies the volume of the sound to make it much louder for your ears.

Earcare hearing aid is a hearing amplifier designed to improve hearing by making sound audible to a person with hearing loss.

The hearing aid app enhances audio from your surrounding and helps you hear clearly during meetings and conversations.

Hearing Aid App for Android amplifies sounds in the environment, including speech, so that they become louder and clearer to the hearing-impaired individual.

Hearing Aid App for Android is designed to aid people who have hearing impairment or hearing loss. Hearing Aid App for Android turns your phone into a hearing aid.

Don’t miss another word! Hearing Aid App for Android will help you hear better in a variety of everyday situations.

Earcare hearing aid is a powerful sound amplifier that empowers you to live life to the very fullest.

When you connect your earphones, a speaker’s speech is sent directly to your phone’s microphone. This allows you to hear the speaker at a level louder.

Whether you’re hearing impaired, hard of hearing, suffering mild to moderate hearing loss, cannot afford prescription hearing aid, struggle to hear speech or external sounds, forgot to bring your prescription hearing aid with you to work or school, cannot hear your TV at regular volume, or struggle to hear your teacher during classroom lessons, Earcare Hearing Aid App for Android will make the sound much louder and clearer for your ears.

You only need wired earphones to use this hearing aid app.
No need asking people to repeat themselves. “What did you say?” and “Can you repeat that?” are a thing of the past.

Hear what’s happening around you using hearing aid app for Android.

Earcare app is the ultimate hearing amplifier, sound amplifier, volume booster and hearing aid app!

FEATURES:
- Booster: Amplify the volume of the sound for louder hearing;
- Noise Suppression: Filter out background noise for clear sound.
- Audio Recorder: Record and save the sound to listen again later.
- Microphone Selection: Choose whether to use either the phone’s mic or headset’s mic.
- Amplify left ear and right ear separately.
- Create unlimited settings profiles for different situations;
- Supports Bluetooth headsets and Android-compatible hearing aids.
- Continue listening in the background even if you’re using other apps or the phone’s screen is locked off.
descriptionShort: Hearing aid app for Android solves your hearing problems.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: No delay when using wired earphones or wired headphones.

title:
Hearing Aid App for Android
2.1.0.1

creator: Firehawk
descriptionHtml:
Hearing Aid App For Android – Application Improves Hearing And Amplifies Sounds!

Struggling to keep up in conversations, lectures, or meetings? No worries! Hearing Aid App For Android is an excellent solution! This Amplify Sound Enhancer mobile application functions as a Hearing Amplifier & Listening Device, enabling you to capture external sounds and stream them to your device more clearly and at increased volumes.

Bear in mind that people with mild hearing loss or people who are trying to find a free hearing aid app, with the Sound Amplifier: Hear Booster, this Boost Hearing Aid Free App enhances the hearing experience with ease.

Key features of Hearing Aid App For Android:
🧏Audio Enhancer: Sound Booster - increase the hearing volume;
🔊Noise Control: Eliminate background disturbances for clearer audio;
🔉Audio Recorder: Allows you to record and personalize sounds;
🎤Super Hearing Volume Booster: Use the phone mic or a selected headset mic;
👂Left and Right: For each ear sound adjustment enables you to amplify sounds;
⚙️Sound Amplifier: Hear Booster- Saving various environmental sound settings;
📡Bluetooth Supported: Hearing Aid App For Android works with Bluetooth earphones as well;
📱Background Mode: This feature lets users listen while working on another task or with the device locked.

Now You Can Relish The Sounds More Effectively, Anytime Or Anywhere!

With the Hearing Aid App For Android, you can turn your phone into a hearing-enhancing device that makes all everyday sounds clearer and louder. This Audio Enhancer: Sound Booster app serves its purpose perfectly whether you need a Hearing Amplifier & Listening Device or a boost hearing aid free app for general hearing assistance.

Now It Is Possible To Hear With Boost Hearing Aid Free App: 🔊
The Sound Amplifier: Hear Booster enables automatic enhancement of speech while other environmental noises are amplified; this helps in distinguishing speech in a noisy atmosphere. The Amplify Super Hearing Volume Booster looks after your Hearing Amplifier & Listening Device needs by effortless adjusting volume levels. This Audio Enhancer: Sound Booster makes every sound clear, be it meetings, lectures or even social events.

Every Word Matters:🗣️
While listening with the use of technology like Sound Amplifier: Hear Booster, one can enjoy audios in a higher quality since speech is amplified and background noise is reduced. In addition, with features like Amplify Sound Enhancer, one is able to adjust the volume to suit one's surroundings. Likewise, one will not miss out on an important sound ever again, regardless attending an active audience or being in a quiet place.

Every Word Can Now Be Understood Clearly!

Super hearing volume booster app uses phone powered wired or Bluetooth earphones to capture speech in low volume with high clarity, so rest easy and make conversations enjoyable. The Hearing Aid App For Android is amazing, as it allows its users to use the Amplify Sound Enhancer in different environments without having to compromise the quality of their talk.

Download the ultimate Hearing Amplifier & Listening Device and boost the conversations with high efficiency!

Our app contains following functionalities:
- Medical device app
- Hearing Aid
